Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Wrath of the Sea
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The sea will rise and flood all coastal provinces. Provinces that are struck by the flood will have their income reduced.
Coastal provinces and provinces with lakes will get income -30%
